Verses: 1 appozhudhu Moseyum Isravel Puththirarum Karththaraip Pukazhndhupaadina Paattu: Karththaraip Paaduven; Avar Magimaiyaai Vetrisirandhaar; Kudhiraiyaiyum Kudhiraiveeranaiyum Kadalile Thallinaar.
2 karththar En Belanum En Geedhamumaanavar; Avar Enakku Ratchippumaanavar; Avare En Dhevan, Avarukku Vaasasthalaththai Aayaththampannuven; Avare En Thagappanudaiya Dhevan, Avarai Uyarththuven;
3 karththare Yuththaththil Vallavar; Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam.
4 paarvonin Radhangalaiyum Avan Senaigalaiyum Samuththiraththile Thalli Vittaar; Avanudaiya Piradhaana Adhibadhigal Sivandha Samuththiraththil Amizhndhu Ponaargal.
5 aazhi Avargalai Moodikkondadhu; Kallaippola Aazhangalil Amizhndhu Ponaargal.
6 karththaave, Ummudaiya Valadhukaram Balaththinaal Magaththuvam Sirandhirukkiradhu; Karththaave, Ummudaiya Valadhukaram Pagaignanai Norukkivittadhu.
7 umakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbinavargalai Umadhu Mukkiyaththin Magaththuvaththinaale Nirmoolamaakkineer; Ummudaiya Kobaakkiniyai Anuppineer, Adhu Avargalaith Thaalatiyaippolap Patchiththadhu.
8 umadhu Naasiyin Suvaasaththinaal Jalam Kumindhu Nindradhu; Vellam Kumiyalaaga Nimirndhu Nindradhu; Aazhamaana Jalam Nadukkadalile Uraindhupoyitru.
9 thodaruven, Pidippen, Kollaiyaadip Pangiduven, En Aasai Avargalidaththil Thirupthiyaagum, En Pattayaththai Uruvuven, En Kai Avargalaich Sangarikkum Endru Pagaignan Sonnaan.
10 ummudaiya Kaatrai Veesappannineer, Kadal Avargalai Moodikkondadhu; Thiralaana Thanneergalil Eeyampola Amizhndhuponaargal.
11 karththaave, Dhevargalil Umakku Oppaanavar Yaar? Parisuththaththil Magaththuvamullavarum, Thudhigalil Bayappadath Thakkavarum, Arpudhangalaich Seygiravarumaagiya Umakku Oppaanavar Yaar?
12 neer Umadhu Valadhukaraththai Neettineer; Boomi Avargalai Vizhungippottadhu.
13 neer Meettukkonda Indha Janangalai Umadhu Kirubaiyinaale Azhaiththu Vandheer; Ummudaiya Parisuththa Vaasasthalaththukku Neraaga Avargalai Umadhu Balaththinaal Vazhinadaththineer.
14 janangal Adhaik Kettuth Thaththalippaargal; Pelisthiyaavin Kudigalaith Thigil Pidikkum.
15 edhomin Pirabukkal Kalanguvaargal; Movaabin Baraakkiramasaaligalai Nadukkam Pidikkum; Kaanaanin Kudigal Yaavarum Karaindhupovaargal.

16 bayamum Thigilum Avargalmel Vizhum. Karththaave, Umadhu Janangal Kadandhupogumvaraiyum, Neer Meetta Janangale Kadandhupogumvaraiyum, Avargal Ummudaiya Puyaththin Magaththuvaththinaal Kallaippola Asaivatriruppaargal.

17 neer Avarkalaik Kontupoi, Karththaraakiya Thevareer Vaasampannukiradharku Niyamiththa Sdhaanamaakiya Ummutaiya Sudhandharaththin Parvadhaththilum, Aantavaraakiya Thevareerutaiya Karangal Sdhaapiththa Parisuththa Sdhalaththilum Avarkalai Naattuveer.
18 karththar Sadhaakaalangalaagiya Endrendraikkum Raajareegam Pannuvaar.

19 paarvonin Kudhiraigal Avanudaiya Iradhangalodum Kudhiraiveerarodum Samuththiraththil Piravesiththadhu; Karththar Samuththiraththin Jalaththai Avargal Mel Thirumbappanninaar; Isravel Puththiraro Samuththiraththin Naduve Vettaandharaiyile Nadandhuponaargal Endru Paadinaargal.
20 aaronin Sagodhariyaagiya Miriyaam Ennum Theerkkadharisiyaanavalum Than Kaiyile Thamburai Eduththukkondaal; Sagala Sthireegalum Thamburugalodum Nadanaththodum Avalukkup Pinne Purappattupponaargal.
21 miriyaam Avargalukkup Piradhivasanamaaga: Karththaraip Paadungal, Avar Magimaiyaai Vetrisirandhaar; Kudhiraiyaiyum Kudhiraiveeranaiyum Kadalile Thallinaar Endru Paadinaal.

22 pinbu Mose Isravel Janangalaich Sivandha Samuththiraththilirundhu Pirayaanappaduththinaan. Avargal Soor Vanaandharaththukkup Purappattuppoi, Moondru Naal Vanaandharaththil Thanneer Kidaiyaamal Nadandhaargal.
23 avargal Maaraavile Vandhapodhu, Maaraavin Thanneer Kasappaayirundhadhinaal Adhaik Kudikka Avargalukkuk Koodaadhirundhadhu; Adhinaal Avvidaththukku Maaraa Endru Peritappattadhu.
24 appozhudhu Janangal Mosekku Virodhamaai Murumuruththu: Ennaththaik Kudippom Endraargal.

25 mose Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittaan; Appozhudhu Karththar Mosekku Oru Maraththaik Kaanbiththaar; Adhai Avan Thanneeril Pottavudane, Adhu Madhuramaana Thanneeraayitru. Avar Ange Avargalukku Oru Niyamaththaiyum Oru Niyaayaththaiyum Kattalaiyittu, Ange Avargalaich Sodhiththu:

26 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththaik Gavanamaaik Kettu, Avar Paarvaikkuch Semmaiyaanavaigalaich Seydhu, Avar Kattalaigalukkuch Sevikoduththu, Avarudaiya Niyamangal Yaavaiyum Kaikkondaal, Naan Egipthiyarukku Varappannina Viyaadhigalil Ondraiyum Unakku Varappannen; Naane Un Parigaariyaagiya Karththar Endraar.
27 pinbu Avargal Elimukku Vandhaargal; Ange Pannirandu Neerootrugalum Ezhuvadhu Pereechchamarangalum Irundhadhu; Ange Thanneer Aruge Paalayamiranginaargal.
